function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of ubpi in limited resource settings","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Breaching confidentiality in telepsychiatry consultations","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased psychological distress in the general population due to strict movement restrictions and isolation procedures during covid-19 crisis in malaysia.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Healthcare providers, especially those on the frontlines, at increased risk of psychological distress and vicarious trauma due to covid-19 crisis.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in delivering mental health services during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective collaborative practice in the malaysian mental health system","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Paucity of literature on the mechanisms underlying the relationship between greenspace and health","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited research on the association between urban greenery and health benefits","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of replication of health benefits in an urban environment","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about the mechanisms underlying the relationship between greenspace and health may limit the ability to optimize health benefits from natural environments.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Undervaluation of greenspace as a resource for health may lead to underinvestment and underutilization of natural environments for promoting public health.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small sample sizes in studies on forest bathing","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recent growth in interest in greenspace and health","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Papers and documents not written in english","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low-income neighborhoods have reduced greenspace availability, leading to lower use of greenspaces","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Low-Medium"},{"name":"Park quality and frequency of park use are higher among high-socioeconomic status ses residents","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Low-Medium"},{"name":"Lack of healthcare trace and tracking in epidemiological management.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proximity economies and place-based perspective in economic development policies.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of privacy protection for individuals’ purchasing and movement data","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of economic instability and disparity in neighborhoods due to post-pandemic contractions","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient investment capacity for digital visibility","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Liquidity crisis due to pandemic","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relaunch of territories’ economies depending on the indirect effects of the knowledge economy from a proximity perspective.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to essential services within a short distance","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on local businesses and trade for essential services","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on real estate sector in turkey","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited support measures for entrepreneurs with leased properties","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High risk of economic loss due to prolonged closure of retail sales","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of permanent closure of small businesses","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of continued economic decline in service and entertainment sectors","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in employment","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collapse in retail sales","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in remote working","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global recession impacting growth prospects","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions in industrial manufacturing and drop in commodity prices","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Amplification of social, spatial, and economic inequalities due to covid-19","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption to the continuity of essential services after a crisis","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective recognition of the gravity of crisis situations","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intense threat and surprise during defensive phase","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Marginalisation of vulnerability in risk assessment","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Narrow focus on common threats and exclusion of interdependencies","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of resourcefulness in crisis management","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of rapidity in restoring functionality after a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contradictory definitions of resilience may lead to confusion and inefficiency in implementation of resilience measures.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of full incorporation of resilience-based approach into eu and national frameworks may result in inadequate protection of critical infrastructure.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contradictory understanding of resilience may hinder the achievement of disaster risk reduction and climate change adaptation objectives.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overestimation of contingency planning","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Narrow focus on building barriers and fortification strategies","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of business continuity planning for critical infrastructure operators","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to prevent cascading crises in high complexity systems","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"}]}
